narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Spectra Human Services Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Lakewood, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $94.0M in Medicaid payments across 154K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $94.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
